original_text: So you should all respect him properly. When he is ready to leave, help him with the things that he needs. Then he can continue his journey and come to me here. I am waiting for him to come with the other believers.
korean_text: 그러므로 누구든지 그를 멸시하지 말고 평안히 보내어 내게로 오게 하라 나는 그가 형제들과 함께 오기를 기다리노라

sentences.original_text: So you should all respect him properly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 너희는 모두 그를 바르게 존중해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: When he is ready to leave
help him with the things that he needs
Then he can continue his journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 여행을 계속할 수 있습니다
그리고 여기 있는 나에게 올 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: I am waiting for him to come
